
---

## 5. `ROADMAP.md` — Feature roadmap

```markdown
# Roadmap

## Phase 1 — Core Game (MVP)
- [ ] Basic board with 6 answers
- [ ] Reveal buttons
- [ ] Next question button
- [ ] Static question set in `script.js`
- [ ] Basic team scores (manual update or simple add)

## Phase 2 — Host Control + Strikes
- [ ] Host control panel layout
- [ ] Strike tracking (3 X's with animation)
- [ ] Control indicator (which team owns the board)
- [ ] Round multipliers (x1, x2, x3)
- [ ] Auto-score calculation from revealed answers

## Phase 3 — Face-Off Flow
- [ ] Face-Off screen
- [ ] “Buzz in” simulation (host selects who answered first)
- [ ] Host selects each team’s answer from list
- [ ] Determine control based on higher answer
- [ ] “Skip Face-Off” and “New Face-Off” buttons

## Phase 4 — Question Bank
- [ ] Move questions into `questions.json`
- [ ] Load questions dynamically
- [ ] In-browser editor for questions/answers
- [ ] Save to `localStorage` (no backend)

## Phase 5 — Fast Money Round
- [ ] Fast Money UI
- [ ] 5-question rapid-fire flow
- [ ] Per-player timers (20 seconds)
- [ ] Combined score calculation
- [ ] 200-point win logic

## Phase 6 — Polish & UX
- [ ] Sound effects (ding, buzzer, bell, duplicate)
- [ ] Animations for reveals and strikes
- [ ] Responsive layout for TV/laptop/tablet
- [ ] Theming/customization options

## Phase 7 — Optional Future Enhancements
- [ ] Separate host/player devices with sync
- [ ] Backend for shared games
- [ ] User-created game packs
